original:
The Czech Republic's prime minister, Andrej Babis, has accused his main political opponent, Jan Hamáček, of lying and failing to withstand the heat of the country's election campaign. Mr. Hamáček, leader of the Social Democratic Party, is running against Mr. Babis in the upcoming parliamentary elections, scheduled for October 8-9.
Speaking at an election rally in Prague on Friday, Mr. Babis lashed
sampled:
The Czech Republic's prime regent, Andrej Babis, has accused his main political opponent, Jan Hamáček, with lying and failing to withstand the heat of the country's election campaign. Mr. Hamáček, leader of the Social Democratic Party, is running against Mr. Babis in the upcoming parliamentary elections, scheduled of October 8-9.
